ray.rage.scene.controllers

Class ScalingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.scene.controllers.AbstractController
      • ray.rage.scene.controllers.ScalingController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, Periodic, Throttleable, Node.Controller

    public class ScalingController
extends AbstractController
implements Throttleable, Periodic
    A Node.Controller implementation that scales controlled nodes.

    The scaling process alternates based on a time limit, called the cycle, at which point, the "direction" of the scaling process is reverted. In other words, an object being scaled "up" (i.e. getting progressively larger) will be scaled "down" (i.e. get progressively smaller) until the cycle time limit is reached again.

    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera
